title.rendered: Luminous Night Revealed for Minecraft Dungeons – XboxEra

content.rendered:
A new seasonal event is on the way for Minecraft Dungeonsarriving April 20, 2022. Explore the Tower at night with a plethora of glowing elements, full of fresh new floors, featuring everything from mysterious murals and perplexing puzzles to the wildfire – a fiery foe that may prove too hot for even the most seasoned adventurers! Proceed with caution as his opponents prefer it well done!

Like last season, there are tons of new rewards to earn – rewards that look extra stylish at night. Skins, capes, emotes, and flairs will illuminate your surroundings with a glowing light, while new adorable pets like the ministry and abomination will light the fire in your heart. You might also appreciate the upcoming new quality of life features, like the much-anticipated Storage Chest, which will bring order to your chaotic inventory.

For more important information and deep dives into the upcoming update, keep your eyes peeled for the Minecraft Dungeons website – or use the disco ball with a feast dance. Stay tuned – your seasonal adventure continues in Luminous Night!
